title: Brooch, "Brooch with cameo of Charity", before 1892
markings: Setting: Interlocked "C"s on inside of setting.  Cameo: Interlocked "C"s incised in sapphire under base on which the figure of charity rests feet.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors
description: Gold brooch set with oval, carved sapphire cameo of personification of Charity with her children.

tombstone.epitaph:
Brooch, "Brooch with cameo of Charity", before 1892.
before 1892. Gold, sapphire. Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors. 1969-40-44.
